item.title: Delagrange, Susan - 'Embodiment by Design'
item.description: One Liner A one line to help remember. Summary What are the salient points. Think about what the piece is, the argument, etc Uses, Thoughts, and Connections What do you think about it, how might you use this, does it fit?
